domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Gaming Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to offline and online games such as gaming consoles, tabletop games, video game publishers

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: Even Witches🧙‍♀️ know it's better to leave their dusty brooms🧹 behind, become members of the WIZZ Discount Club, and enjoy some scary good deals all year round. Like today! If you're also a member, book your tickets now and get 20% OFF on selected flights!👉https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/7bB9SvNJ3q
@Iamphoenix___ If you type "chat with an agent" to Amelia then she'll connect you to an available person as soon as possible.

data.text: @proksu2 Hi! We're sorry to hear what happened. Please reach out to the Customer Relations via this link and they'll assist you further: https://t.co/F1LYZYRxMV
@JesusRos91 Hi. You'll need a fit-to-fly document signed by your doctor that's not older than 6 days at the time of your departure.
@ALFONSITO_080 @HappyThings2020 If you type "chat with an agent" to Amelia then she'll connect you to an available person as soon as possible.
@TMemepizza @LilWizz Hi. Scooters are not allowed.

domain.name: Business Taxonomy

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

data.text: @ALFONSITO_080 @HappyThings2020 Hi! Please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre, so we can help you with this: https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

@chris49685083 Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.

data.text: @alically2963 Hi! If you haven't received a refund within two weeks, please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre and we will check the status of your refund: https://t.co/vVE5ttZOAD.
@HappyThings2020 Hi there, thank you for your kind words! We are always trying to improve our customer service!
@Ruttysays Hi Aho! Yes, you can as long as it fits in the dimensions of 55 x 40 x 23 cm. Have a nice journey!

data.text: @h_lovat Hi Henry! We apologise that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.
